19#ifndef DIRNAME_H_
20# define DIRNAME_H_ 1
21
22# ifndef PARAMS
23# if defined PROTOTYPES || (defined __STDC__ && __STDC__)
24# define PARAMS(Args) Args
25# else
26# define PARAMS(Args) ()
27# endif
28# endif
29
30# ifndef DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR
31# define DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR '/'
32# endif
33
34# ifndef ISSLASH
35# define ISSLASH(C) ((C) == DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR)
36# endif
37
38# ifndef FILESYSTEM_PREFIX_LEN
39# define FILESYSTEM_PREFIX_LEN(Filename) 0
40# endif
41
42char *base_name PARAMS ((char const *path));
43char *dir_name PARAMS ((char const *path));
44size_t base_len PARAMS ((char const *path));
45size_t dir_len PARAMS ((char const *path));
46
47int strip_trailing_slashes PARAMS ((char *path));
48
49#endif /* not DIRNAME_H_ */
50
